{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:32.019
    | text      = So here's the passage from Bill Clinton's book, My Life in Full.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:35.619
    | text      = I was particularly intrigued by the voodoo religion and culture to which I had some limited
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:40.619
    | text      = exposure in New Orleans and that existed alongside Catholicism in Haiti.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:45.119
    | text      = The name of the traditional Haitian religion comes from the Faun language of Benin in West
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:49.140
    | text      = Africa where voodoo originated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:51.460
    | text      = It means god or spirit without the connotations of black magic and witchcraft attached to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:55.859
    | text      = it in so many movies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:57.740
    | text      = Voodoo's central ritual is a dance during which spirits possess believers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:01.740
    | text      = On the most interesting day of the trip, I got a chance to observe voodoo in practice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:06.099
    | text      = The city bank contact in Port-au-Prince offered to take him, Hillary, and me to a nearby village
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:11.200
    | text      = to meet an unusual voodoo priest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:13.740
    | text      = Max Beauvoir had spent 15 years outside Haiti studying at the Sorbonne in Paris and working
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:19.099
    | text      = in New York.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:20.240
    | text      = He had a beautiful blonde French wife and two bright young daughters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:23.680
    | text      = He'd been practicing chemical engineering until his voodoo priest grandfather on his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:28.420
    | text      = deathbed chose Max to succeed him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:31.019
    | text      = Max was a believer and he did, though it must have been a proved a challenge for his French
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:36.000
    | text      = wife and westernized kids.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:38.420
    | text      = We arrived in the late afternoon an hour or so before the dance ceremony, which Max opened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:42.900
    | text      = to paying tourists as a way of covering some of the costs of his operation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:47.000
    | text      = He explained that in voodoo, god is manifest to humans through spirits that represent forces
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:50.940
    | text      = of light and darkness, good and evil, which are more or less in balance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:56.059
    | text      = After Hillary, David, and I finished our brief course in voodoo theology, we were escorted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:00.099
    | text      = back to an open area and seated with other guests who had come to witness the ceremony,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:04.859
    | text      = in which spirits are called forth and enter into the bodies of dancing believers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:09.259
    | text      = After several minutes of rhythmic dancing to pounding drums, the spirits arrived, seizing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:13.299

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:14.660
    | text      = The man proceeded to rub a burning torch all over his body and walk on hot coals without
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:18.660
    | text      = being burned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:19.880

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:23.859
    | text      = off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:24.859
    | text      = Then the spirits left and those that had been possessed fell to the ground.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:27.980
    | text      = I describe my brief foray into the world of voodoo because I've always been fascinated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:31.519
    | text      = by the way different cultures tried to make sense of life, nature, and the virtually universal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:36.039
    | text      = belief that there is a non-physical spirit force at work in the world that existed before
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:40.819
    | text      = humanity and will be here when we're all long gone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.480

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:52.700
    | text      = old adage that the Lord works in mysterious ways.
}}

    | text      = So Alex has taken this passage of an interesting foreign experience and turned it into, Bill
}}
